title: Metro style for WPF (Touchable Controls)
body:
Win8 Desktop has WON THE WAR to Windows RT! On tablets and desktops!
But touch devices are the future (ON DESKTOP too, although somebody NOT WANT!)
WPF controls need to adapt to touchable devices and... merge with Windows Store Apps and WP81!!!

comments.body:
The better support for touch is very important! Many companies create touch apps in WPF, because it is possible to control the hardware better than in WinRT. It is also important to implement touch - controls, so that the developer doesn't need to do the basics.
I developed a touch App for a bus driver (ticket sell, road control, ...) (2 years work!) and it was my main Problem, to implement the touch in such a way like WinRT. A Pivot control, which was on the top view Level, was also an important part of the Project. It is really difficult to make Projects with WPF for touch!
